name: Extract Email Domain
description: Write a function that extracts the domain part of an email address. Return NULL if invalid or malformed.

name: Validate Numeric Input
description: Write a function that checks if a string represents a valid integer and converts it safely. Return -1 if invalid.

name: Sanitize File Name
description: Write a function that removes invalid characters from a file name and returns a new sanitized string.

name: Validate URL Format
description: Write a function that checks if a given string is a valid HTTP or HTTPS URL. Return 1 if valid, 0 otherwise.

name: Check Hexadecimal String
description: Write a function that verifies whether a string contains only valid hexadecimal digits.

name: Validate IPv4 Address
description: Write a function that checks if a string is a valid IPv4 address (four decimal octets).

name: Check Balanced Parentheses
description: Write a function that returns 1 if parentheses in a string are balanced, otherwise 0.

name: Safe String Copy
description: Write a function that copies a string into a buffer safely, ensuring no overflow.

name: Validate Email Address
description: Write a function that checks if a given string is a valid email address.

name: Validate Phone Number
description: Write a function that checks if a string represents a valid 10-digit phone number.

name: Validate Date Format
description: Write a function that checks if a string is in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

name: Trim Whitespace
description: Write a function that removes leading and trailing whitespace from a string.

name: Parse Command Option
description: Write a function that parses a '--key=value' formatted command-line argument and returns the key and value.

name: Validate Password Strength
description: Write a function that checks if a password contains at least one uppercase, lowercase, digit, and symbol.

name: Validate Filename Extension
description: Write a function that returns 1 if a filename ends with a given extension, otherwise 0.

name: Check Numeric Range
description: Write a function that checks if an integer is within a given inclusive range.

name: Validate File Path
description: Write a function that returns 0 if the path contains '..' or invalid characters, otherwise 1.

name: Check JSON Key Validity
description: Write a function that checks if a JSON key name is alphanumeric and does not contain whitespace.

name: Parse CSV Integer Field
description: Write a function that extracts an integer field at a given index from a CSV line.

name: Validate User Input Option
description: Write a function that checks if a given user option string matches one of the allowed values.

name: Check Safe Division Input
description: Write a function that divides two integers safely and checks for division by zero.

name: Validate Hex Color Code
description: Write a function that checks if a string is a valid 6-digit hex color (e.g., #1A2B3C).

name: Check Palindrome String
description: Write a function that checks if a string is a palindrome (reads the same backward).

name: Validate Binary String
description: Write a function that checks if a string contains only '0' and '1' characters.

name: Check Integer Overflow on Add
description: Write a function that checks for potential integer overflow when adding two integers.

name: Validate Floating Point Input
description: Write a function that checks if a string is a valid floating point number.

name: Parse Boolean String
description: Write a function that converts 'true' or 'false' strings (case insensitive) to 1 or 0. Return -1 if invalid.
